1.15.25  3:02 pm   Do you ever say "heavens to betsy"?

      i've maybe said it once

1.15.25  1:47 pm   is it a bad thing if i don't want to drink alcohol? i feel like i'm cutting myself off from a huge part of society and culture just because i don't want to consume a mind-altering drug. what do you think?

      i think once you find what else you like to do for fun, it's gonna be worth it

1.15.25  11:53 am   Why is the alphabet arranged like that

      certainly to anger you

1.15.25  10:43 am   what if there were no guidelines 

      you'd probably wanna make some, at some point

1.15.25  10:30 am   I just turned 18, any advice? 

      it sounds like everything is going fine

1.15.25  9:46 am   what was the worst question asked here

      they are all equally bad, which is actually pretty good

1.15.25  9:34 am   how do you feel when you grocery shop and you're one cent short?

      fine

1.15.25  9:10 am   Caeser was assassinated in a senate meeting, That just happens to be held in the theater of Pompey -his enemy in the civil war-, But during that senate meeting, out of 8 or 9 hundred senates only around 200 came which made the 60 who were conspiring against him a very sizeable amount of the senates there which made his assassination way easier.  My question is : did you invite the rest of the senates into like a BBQ or something so Caesar's assassination could be d9ne easier?

      no i did not. i have many friends who can attest to the fact that i was minding my own business during that exact time

1.15.25  8:46 am   what the hell is a kelvin and why is it used to measure temprature

      basically Lord Kelvin one day got frustrated with all the 'negative' temperatures in celsius and said 'why cant we start the thermometer actually at the lowest possible temperature?' So he started doing it. he called it "absolute celsius" and it's the same as celsius but it's offset so 0 actually means the lowest possible physical temperature anything can be. so scientists love it for measuring ridiculously cold things in space

1.15.25  3:21 am   Do you think we'll ever meet?

      it's possible

      how about antarctica

      it's somewhere

      it's ok with me

      no

1.14.25  7:48 pm   why do we say "the best thing since sliced bread?" is anybody really that impressed with sliced bread? I'm not.

      the reason a lot of people say things is because other people say it

1.14.25  5:19 pm   do you prefer the unserious ue'q'stions or the other ones? Do you think there is a difference?

      there's way more different differences

1.14.25  5:12 pm   Ten o'clock, is that ten on the clock, ten of the clock or ten off the clock? (ten over the clock?)(ten on clock?)

      i believe it's ten of the clock

     no

     Any tips?

     you'd like other people too, maybe even more

1.14.25  11:48 am   Do you like going to the grocery store? 

      sort of

      one hand clapping, 2 hands clapping, 3 hands clapping

1.14.25  2:49 am   Are you satisfied with how your day has gone? Or do you wish it turned out differently?

      maybe the full story is actually in a longer duration

1.14.25  2:43 am   How do you say "1e&a2e&a3e&a4e&a" out loud? I mean, how do you pronounce it? 

      one ee and a two ee and a three ee and a 4 ee and a

1.14.25  2:32 am   What is your favorite childhood lie

      the size of things

1.14.25  1:40 am   have you ever considered exploring saturn to find the funny little green space people

      no

1.14.25  12:48 am   Do you look at walls often?

     no

     I think lately they've become less moist, a bit drier, which counteracts all observations done beforehand. What does this mean for humanity?

      nothing. unless actually every wall in the world has become more dry, then of course the implications for humanity would be humanity is now living in a drier climate

1.14.25  12:02 am   How did you develop the stamina and self-discipline to work on projects nonstop for weeks, or even months? There are things I really like doing, and subjects I'm passionate about, but I can't imagine spending every waking hour working on any project for months at a time--no matter gow interested or engaged I would be in the project, I'd eventually get sick of it...how do you not get sick of working on audiovisual projects for inordinate amounts of time? 

      if that kind of dedication becomes important to you, then you'll do it. otherwise you'll be fine without it

1.13.25  11:05 pm   has this question been asked before?

      yes

1.13.25  9:59 pm   how to worry about everything less? it seems like so much pain exists and i feel powerless

      find at least something you CAN do

1.13.25  9:57 pm   Do you have any tips on how to reduce nasal inflammation after doing a little bit too much cocaine?

      no, i have absolutely no cocaine experience. i'm sorry about that

1.13.25  9:41 pm   The question I am to ask is one that I have been holding onto for years. However, in the time that has passed I have learned much of the world and grown old and jaded, and I think I know the truth... there never was going to be an episode about velcro, was there?

      that video devolves into fiction somewhere over south america, and should not be taken seriously after that point. that being said, the scott amundson station really does have the orange checker pattern as shown

1.13.25  8:52 pm   what's your favorite movie

      i can't tell you because it's too hard to explain that i don't mean the bad parts

1.13.25  5:28 pm   how does your completed art influence your unfinished art?.. basically what i mean is do you get inspired(or something) by your past songs/videos?

      only if i'm in a confident mood. i should clarify that i would never be inspired by a previous item to do the same thing again. i would always be inspired to try to do things differently. but if i'm in a confident mood then sometimes i can find reaffirming evidence of my capabilities in general

1.13.25  4:41 pm   how are songwriters like you able to make each instrument feel so dynamic yet function together cohesively? what kind of things do you keep in mind?

      the more things you keep in mind, the more everything will fail. Actually now that i think of it it's just like walking. or dreaming. things like that

1.13.25  4:36 pm   how should i travel back in time? (i want to sneak in a lady gaga music video without anyone knowing)

      you might find out in various ways that it's already there

1.13.25  4:30 pm   whats the first number: 1, 0, or negative infinity

if not these, then you choose

      1

1.13.25  3:41 pm   what do you think the dinosaurs would do in this situation

      eat trees maybe

1.13.25  3:40 pm   how much time is a lot?

      a little while

1.13.25  1:29 pm   So, I've been singing my whole life, have JUST decided at 19 that I'd like to record this, completely new to "producing" if you can call it that at the moment, and for the life of me can't get myself to sync with... myself. I'll sing the melody and harmony lines, be really happy with them individually but when I put them together the phrasing of what I've sang is accidentally SO different. And THEN I hear the differences only by comparing them with each other, but the groove of each one is funky and I don't know which to stick with or how to sync them. They'll start in the same place but then somewhere in the middle something goes awry and they're way off. It's bananas. 

      you're going to need to start understanding time more precisely. develop a counting/notation system. i think it was the buddha who once said, "1e&a2e&a3e&a4e&a"

1.13.25  11:30 am   Do you have any Old Year resolutions?

      no

1.13.25  10:59 am   If i dream about something i read that day which i didnt think much about. Do you think it was more important to my subconscious and thus appeared in the dream? Or could it be that it simply rolled the dice and picked a random data point to show

      i'm not entirely sure

1.13.25  10:39 am   I had lunch for dinner this morning

      that's fine with me

1.13.25  9:02 am   you spelt questions wrong by the way, or am i wrong?

      you're ignoring the color scheme. the bright colored letters should be interpreted as being more important, and should be read first. it's just a slightly more modern version of the fancy title capitalization found in 17th century novels

1.13.25  3:59 am   What's something that took awhile for you to get used to but now you really like?

      being wrong

      now i'm wondering if washing machines ever think that

      fair enough

1.13.25  1:41 am   At what point should you entertain the idea of a travel agent?Vacation planning is.....overwhelming.

      looks like you are entertaining the idea already

1.12.25  10:40 pm   have you found any trends in the sorts of questions people ask here? 

      yes. 80% of the questions are the same 20%

1.12.25  9:18 pm   maybe it's just an impression i get from your answers on this page but you seem to be mostly immune to anger. if true, how did you manage that, if untrue how do you make it look that way? i always briefly lose my shit when i have expectations and then things go contrary to it

      i think you can see anger here from time to time if you know how to detect it

1.12.25  9:04 pm   genre is marketing but marketing is sometimes important

      "rotten fruit is fruit, but sometimes fruit is important" - the fruit rotting industry

1.12.25  9:00 pm   how come stuff happens when you don't want it to

      if you ever have everything happen exactly the way you want for an extended period of time, then i think you'll understand
